category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_Is_Represented_By_relation_primary
preference.preference_description: Indicates the list of valid primary Business Objects for TC_Is_Represented_By relation type. In My Navigator application, when Paste... command is chosen and when the type of selected Business Object type matches one from this preference value, TC_Is_Represented_By relation type becomes available as a choice of relation to create. Also, a runtime property TC_Is_Represented_By gets created for the Business Objects listed in the value of this preference.
